**Reflective Garden Decor**: Use CDs as reflective garden ornaments. Hang them from trees or garden stakes to create a shimmering effect that can deter birds from eating your plants. The reflective surface will catch the sunlight and create a beautiful display while serving a practical purpose.

**Wind Chimes**: Create a set of whimsical wind chimes using CDs. Drill holes in the center of several CDs and string them together with fishing line or twine. Add beads or shells for extra flair. When the wind blows, the CDs will clink together, producing a soothing sound while adding a unique aesthetic to your outdoor space.

**Light Catchers**: Turn CDs into light catchers for your windows. Hang them using clear fishing line so they dangle in front of the glass. When sunlight hits the CDs, they will create colorful reflections and patterns on your walls and floor, enhancing the ambiance of any room.

**Bird Feeders**: Make a simple bird feeder by attaching a CD to a sturdy branch or a tree. Spread peanut butter on one side and roll it in birdseed.
